<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Look through all the blocks in MergePotentials that have hash CurHash</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// (guaranteed to match the last element).  Build the vector SameTails of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// all those that have the (same) largest number of instructions in common</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// of any pair of these blocks.  SameTails entries contain an iterator into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// MergePotentials (from which the MachineBasicBlock can be found) and a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// MachineBasicBlock::iterator into that MBB indicating the instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// where the matching code sequence begins.  Order of elements in SameTails</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// is the reverse of the order in which those blocks appear in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// MergePotentials (where they are not necessarily consecutive).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ComputeSameTails(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurHash, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> minCommonTailLength,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;SuccBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;PredBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Remove all blocks with hash CurHash from MergePotentials, restoring</span></CodeLine>
